content: quick to create this small-scale crochet blanket is big on cozy charm using bernat blanket big mist-ical creates a beautiful multi-colored effect with soft gradients and a touch of sparkle giving the classic moss stitch a fresh twist with easy color changes and striping this project is perfect for practicing moss stitch along with simple color transitions snuggle up with this fun speedy layer that s sure to add comfort and warmth to your space materials bernat® blanket big mist-ical™ 10 5 oz/300 g 32 yds/29 m contrast a grape mix 32015 2 balls or 69 yds/63 m contrast b misty teal 32007 2 balls or 62 yds/57 m contrast c canyon 32009 2 balls or 58 yds/53 m contrast d foam 32001 2 balls or 62 yds/57 m measurements approximately approx 40 x 41 101 5 cm x 104 cm
